probably the file itself.  Do other video's or music play fine
If other files play fine it may be that the file that caused the crash is corrupt or you do not have the codec required to view it.
then it was just that file
Basically what it means is there was a failure to read the file and it made the program crash.  And a core dump is done so you don't lose any information or damage your operating system.
